fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Customs, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Single market, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives: Implementation of the new PPE Regulation (EU) 425/2016 and the implementation of Directive 89/656/EEC
organisation_name: De Belgische beroepsvereniging van fabrikanten, distributeurs en dienstverleners inzake veiligheid en welzijn op het werk en in de vrije tijd (Febelsafe)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
member of E.S.F - European Safety Federation (www.eu-esf.org), 
close coorperation with the Belgian national goverment
goals__remit:
To promote health and safety management and culture in the workplace and enhance health and safety awareness along the whole value chain from prevention to protection. 
To gain a hearing in legislation, implementation, market surveillance and standardisation mainly in the field of PPE taking into account sustainability.
